original_text: God hath delivered into your hands the princes of Midian, Oreb and Zeeb: and what was I able to do in comparison of you? Then their anger was abated toward him, when he had said that.
korean_text: 하나님이 미디안의 방백 오렙과 스엡을 너희 손에 넘겨 주셨으니 내가 한 일이 어찌 능히 너희가 한 것에 비교되겠느냐 하니라 기드온이 이 말을 하매 그 때에 그들의 노여움이 풀리니라

sentences.original_text: God hath delivered into your hands
and what was I able to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 무엇을 할 수 있었겠는가

sentences.original_text: Then their anger was abated toward him
